commands.(no)?react?(s|ing)?( .+|$): function(msg){msg.content=msg.content.replace(new RegExp('^'+bot.prefix,''),'');if(/^no/i.test(msg.content)){msg.channel.reactspam=true}if(msg.author.id==clt.user.id){if(/(s|ing)$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<')}else if(/t$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.reactspam).toString())){if(bot.reacts.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.reacts.push(msg.channel.id)}msg.channel.reactspam=true}else{bot.reacts.rmv(msg.channel.id);msg.channel.reactspam=false}msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<');sav()}else{if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.reactspam).toString())){if(bot.reacts.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.reacts.push(msg.channel.id)}}else{bot.reacts.rmv(msg.channel.id)}sav();msg.delete()}}else{msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<')}}
commands.(no)?vote?(s|ing|All)?( .+)?: function(msg){msg.content=msg.content.replace(new RegExp('^'+bot.prefix,''),'');if(/^no/i.test(msg.content)&&msg.author.id==clt.user.id){msg.channel.votespam=false;bot.vote.rmv(msg.channel.id+'');msg.delete();sav()}else if(msg.content=='vott'&&clt.user.id==msg.author.id&&!bot.vote.has(msg.channel.id+'')){bot.vote.push(msg.channel.id+'');msg.delete();sav()}if(msg.author.id==clt.user.id){if(/(s|ing)$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<')}else if(/All/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])&&msg.guild){msg.guild.channels.array().forEach(chn=>bot.vote.add(chn.id+''))}else if(/e$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.votespam).toString())){if(bot.vote.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.vote.push(msg.channel.id)}msg.channel.votespam=true}else{bot.vote.rmv(msg.channel.id);msg.channel.votespam=false}msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<');sav()}else{if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.votespam).toString())){if(bot.vote.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.vote.push(msg.channel.id)}}else{bot.vote.rmv(msg.channel.id)}sav();msg.delete()}}else{msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<')}}
commands.up(time?)?$: function(msg){msg.reply(`[Bot]: I've been up for ${clt.uptime/1000} seconds`)}
commands.he?lp$: function(msg){msg.reply({content:'*Here you go... ^_^*   Parameters in [] are optional, <> defines datatype.',embed:{title:'Help',description:'__Help Menu__ **[GitHub](https://github.com/ValentinHacker)**',url:'https://github.com/ValentinHacker/Vale',color:Number(rnd().replace('#','0x')),timestamp:new Date(),author:{name:clt.user.tag,url:'https://github.com/ValentinHacker',icon_url:clt.user.avatarURL},thumbnail:{url:'https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/rreeglwpb70wbfn/Akai%20Miku.jpg?dl=1&raw=1'},footer:{icon_url:'https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/8ukrjdolhd8z2f1/Miku%20Hibikase.png?dl=1&raw=1',text:'Image: Hatsune Miku'},fields:[{name:'​',value:'***Basic:***',inline:true},{name:`${bot.prefix}ping`,value:'Command execution delay due to cennection, can also be used to check if bot is (seconds)'},{name:`${bot.prefix}help`,value:'Displays this screen'},{name:`${bot.prefix}votes`,value:'Check if bot is auto-upvoting reactions'},{name:`${bot.prefix}reacts`,value:'Check if bot reacts on keywords'},{name:`${bot.prefix}chid`,value:'Channel ID'},{name:`${bot.prefix}servid`,value:'Server ID'},{name:`${bot.prefix}id [Mention(s)<Tag>]`,value:'User/Channel/Emoji/Role ID'},{name:'​',value:'***Utility:***',inline:true},{name:`${bot.prefix}rp [Time<Number>] Text<String>`,value:'Repeat text N times'},{name:`${bot.prefix}rg Text<String>`,value:'Converts your speech to emojis. :regional_indicator_e::regional_indicator_x::regional_indicator_a::regional_indicator_m::regional_indicator_p::regional_indicator_l::regional_indicator_e::exclamation:'},{name:`${bot.prefix}sd [Milliseconds<Number>] Text<String>`,value:'Self destruction text (delete after time)'},{name:`${bot.prefix}vapor [Strength<Number>] Text<String>`,value:'*V a p o r w a v e d*
